body.name: Belffin Modular Sectional Sleeper Sofa Couch Modular Convertible Sectional Couch Bed Set Module Sleeper Couch Grey
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
features: Free Configurations: Not just sleeper sofa as pictured but also an L shaped couch, U shaped couch and of course can be a sofa set if you re-union the modules. Modular Couch has the endless-configurations possibilties and is the best choice for further use

Ample Storage Space: Under every Middle and Ottoman of our couch bed there are ample storage space for your family. That means one Middle/Ottoman equals one storage box. You can keep some toys and some throws in the sectional sofa when you don't need them

Interchangeable Side: Armrests/Backrests of our oversized modular sleeper can be interchangeable attached with every sides of our Seat/Ottoman. You can change the U shaped couch into L shaped couch or sofa bed

Durable & Sturdy: Our sectional modular is made up with quality wood frame and covered with good foam and fabric, durable and comfortable for daily use. And sturdy enough for pet-family. Every seat cushion of our modular sectional has coil spring and foam for shape long-lasting so the cushion may be a little mid-firm at first. We have tested times and this is the best way for both softness and long-lasting use

Easy Assemble: simple assemble required. Instructions manual and tools included. Overall dimensions of this large sofa sleeper is 116.6x58.3x33.5"(LxWxH), this modular sectional sleeper comes with 9 boxes, may arrive at different days

Fabric: Terry fabric is kind of soft basic upholstery fabric, compared to the velvet we used before it is more roughed up and caused to pill a little bit. But overall it is soft in a nice way. Very comfortable and durable fabric for you and your pet friends

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Couch and Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: This couch is awesome. It was easy to put together with clear instructions and it’s super customizable. I was missing two of the brackets I needed, so I reached out to the vendor. They got back to me quickly and sent the two brackets I needed within a day! They kept in communication with me and I couldn’t have asked for a better experience.As for the couch, there is storage for days. It’s very firm but we kind of like that and the color is stunning. The fabric is soft and easy to clean. We chose this couch so we could add to it once we get a bigger place, and none of us regret the decision. It’s the same width as our old couch but adding the ottomans means all three of us can sit and the dogs can too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big guy approved
reviews.reviewText: This went together in a snap. Very easy assembly. I weigh 330lbs and have slept on this for a few nights before my new bed arrived at my new apartment. I was VERY pleasantly surprised that there was so much support. At no time did I feel the frame or anything while I was side sleeping on it. As far as modular couches go this is very good quality. I would place this better than any modular they offer for 3 reasons. Cost, storage and durability. It's still to early to tell how well it will hold up but so far I have no doubt it will be fine. As a very large man I have a way of coaxing furniture to fail quickly if it's gonna fail. This is recommended highly. I'll likely buy a chair kit for this soon too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect! Perfect! Perfect!
reviews.reviewText: So much better that I thought it was going to be. 1 person easy setup. Firm but quite comfortable. Storage is awesome. So happy with this purchase 🥰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I'M IN LOVE WITH THIS COUCH
reviews.reviewText: I don't think I've ever been more in love with furniture than with this couch. It's amazing. That being said, I did take off a star because there are a lot of thread strings hanging from the cushions. I'm not sure how they are going to hold up. I'm trying to find the best solution to see if I can get rid of them myself without compromising the seam quality. Other than that, the cushions pretty much came assembled and are very sturdy and firm (but comfortable,) and they have plenty of storage underneath; the fabric is easy to clean crumbs/cat hair (I have 4 cats.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I suffer from some arthritis and move slowly so I had to assemble this all by myself. It took me all day. But I tell you this, at the end of my project to complete it, I could not have been happier. Just look at it, it is beautiful, and cozy, and would give up my bed to sleep in it lol. I love that you can change the arrangement when it fancies you. Buy this, you will not be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: This is possibly one of the best purchase I have made thus far. I love this couch! I purchased the sleeper sofa 2, it came in six big boxes, it was very easy to assemble, the manufacturer gives you screw driver tool, not those annoying little L shaped things but an actual screw driver. The instructions are easy to follow and stress free. The couch is very comfortable and I love that each seat has a storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly and beautiful!
reviews.reviewText: I cannot say enough good things about this sectional! It was so easy to assemble and we love the storage under each piece. I also love that all pieces are interchangeable and we can make the section U shape, L shape, right facing or left facing or whatever we want! It’s very comfortable and firm. The only thing is I wish the cushions were a little deeper but with the additional ottomans to make the sectional U shape or L shape this makes up for that :) it’s also doggy approved! 10/10 recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but too expensive for what you get
reviews.reviewText: The sofa is nice and good quality. It's a bit firm, especially for sleeping. It's too expensive for what you get. If I were going to purchase a sofa like this in the future, I would buy one at a furniture store where I could see the size and test out the comfort.
